title: Unlocking the Potentials of Rice Bran through Extrusion: A Systematic Review

Rice bran (RB) is a by-product of the rice milling process and is rich in nutrients and bioactive compounds making it a valuable ingredient for extruded foods. Preferred Reporting Items...
